name: Web Search Shared Settings
description: Shared configuration for web search functionality, automatically available when any search engine is configured

openwebui_variables.name: ENABLE_SEARCH_QUERY_GENERATION
openwebui_variables.description: Enable AI-powered query optimization for web search.

openwebui_variables.name: WEB_SEARCH_TRUST_ENV
openwebui_variables.description: Use http_proxy and https_proxy environment variables for web search requests.

openwebui_variables.name: WEB_SEARCH_RESULT_COUNT
openwebui_variables.description: Maximum number of search results to process and retrieve.

openwebui_variables.name: WEB_LOADER_CONCURRENT_REQUESTS
openwebui_variables.description: Number of concurrent requests for fetching web page content from search results.

openwebui_variables.name: BYPASS_WEB_SEARCH_EMBEDDING_AND_RETRIEVAL
openwebui_variables.description: Skip RAG processing of web search results.

openwebui_variables.name: YOUTUBE_LOADER_PROXY_URL
openwebui_variables.description: Proxy URL for YouTube transcript fetching.

openwebui_variables.name: YOUTUBE_LOADER_LANGUAGE
openwebui_variables.description: Comma-separated list of language codes to try when fetching YouTube transcripts, in priority order.
